name: BURGER IMPACT: SOLAR STRIKE
description:
BURGER IMPACT is a high-speed physics-based action game set in a future where fast food battles against enemy factions in outer space. Take control of Burger, who must journey and battle across the galaxy in order to rescue French Fries from a mysterious entity. Could this be a plot by the nefarious Potato Empire, or are there other forces at play?

Key Features


  • Two-button control system: Simple controls, but high depth with a variety of advanced techniques to discover! Mouse & Keyboard input, Controller input, and the Steam Deck are supported.
  • A new type of 3D flying gameplay: Engage in the original “space-billiards realtime combat system” and enjoy thrilling high-speed action! As Burger, fly freely at high-speed, orbit around objects, charge up, and launch the objects to destroy stars, enemies, and other obstacles!
  • Orbit Mode: Activate Orbit Mode to gravitate to and freely orbit any valid object within range. This is the basis for aiming in the "space-billiards realtime combat system", and it also allows for more advanced techniques such as hiding behind objects, sticking to enemies, or hitching a ride on a launched object for rapid movement.
  • Aiming Simulation: While in Orbit Mode, you can see a series of simulation lines from the orbit target, which you can use to set up a chain reaction from a single shot. For example, you can make a trick shot to destroy multiple enemies at once or ricochet a shot off an obstacle to hit an enemy’s blind spot.
  • Gravity System: Some objects in the world produce gravitational force! These can attract, repel, or spin the player, nearby objects or enemies. This includes other gravity-producing objects!
  • Minimal waiting time: Extra attention has been put into minimizing waiting time to the maximum extent possible, such that the player is in control nearly 100% of the time. Every cutscene and sequence is skippable, with no lengthy unskippable transitions anywhere in the game.
  • Vegan Mode: This game is Vegan Friendly! With Vegan Mode enabled, you can be assured that no animal or seafood-based products are present in the game!!!
